Policy.acknowledgement_statement: These data were generated and made available by the BRAINcode consortium. The BRAINcode consortium includes the following investigators Xianjun Dong (Harvard Medical School, Brigham & Women's Hospital), Charles H Adler (Mayo Clinic), Matthew P Frosch (Massachusetts General Hospital), Peter T Nelson (University of Kentucky), Patrizia Rizzu (German Center for Neurodegenerative Diseases), Antony A Cooper (Garvan Institute of Medical Research), Peter Heutink (German Center for Neurodegenerative Diseases), Thomas G Beach (Banner Sun Health Research Institute), John S Mattick (Garvan Institute of Medical Research), Ferenc Muller (University of Birmingham), and Clemens R Scherzer (Co-ordinating Principal Investigator; Harvard Medical School, Brigham & Women's Hospital). BRAINcode was funded in part by NIH grant U01 NS082157 and the U.S. Department of Defense (to C.R.S.); with additional support from the Michael J. Fox Foundation (MJFF) (to C.R.S. and C.H.A., respectively); the Australia NHMRC GNT1067350 (to A.C. and J.M.); NIA P30 AG028383 (to P.T.N.); U.K. Wellcome Trust Investigator award (to F.M.); NINDS U24 NS072026 National Brain and Tissue Resource for Parkinson’s Disease and Related Disorders (to T.G.B. and C.H.A.).

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution responded that the study is not sensitive without submitting a new Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (COL)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-COL
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).
